MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY16 postcode area  of Newtown.  It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5PM. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 7PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:16PM on 28th October 2020.
